item.title: First Post
item.description:
Hello â€” this is the first post on the site. I’m trying to dip my toes into building SSGs using Hugo. This website uses the Chicago7 theme - It is styled after the old Macintosh System7 OS and has monospaced font inspired by the classic Chicago typeface.

More to follow..
